EmailTemplate.subject: 15% Off your qualifying purchase $175 - valid1/29/18 - 2/23/18
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your Account Rep: {!User.Name} P: 855-337-6811 Ext: {!User.ISO_Extension__c} E: {!User.Email}
great relationships start with great savings! 15% OFF $175 your qualifying purchase use coupon code: 37284555
Redeem Online Now
Valid 1/29/18 – 2/23/18. Exc technology. See below for details.
Update Your Tech Shop All Essentials Stock The Breakroom
15% off your qualifying order of $175 or more: Valid only at business.officedepot.com or by phone at 888.2.OFFICE or fax at 888.813.7272. Offer not valid for government contract accounts. Not combinable with Store Purchasing or Procurement Cards. Use the coupon code for phone or fax orders or enter the coupon code to cart online at checkout. Not valid for purchases: 1) of gift cards; 2) of any technology or consumer electronic products and accessories or media and software products; 3) of postage or mailing/shipping services; 4) of performance protection plans; 5) of HP ink or toner; 6) of Epson ink; 7) of Tech Depot Services or third party services; or 8) premiums/free gifts with purchase. Coupon cannot be used as an account payment. Coupon is good for one-time use only, is not transferable, is not for resale or auction and cannot be combined with other offers or promotions. No cash back. Void where prohibited. We reserve the right to limit quantities sold to each customer. Limit 1 coupon per customer/business. Coupon Expires 2/23/18 11:59 PM ET. Coupon Code: 37284555.
Prices and offers are valid only at business.officedepot.com or by phone at 888.2.OFFICE or fax at 888.813.7272 from 1/29/18 – 2/23/18. Offers are non-transferable. Prices and offers are not combinable with a Store Purchasing Card. Office Depot reserves the right to limit quantities sold to each customer. We are not responsible for errors. List prices are provided by product manufacturers, distributors or determined based upon comparable products and are subject to change. Actual discount varies by price plan. We reserve the right to cancel or limit any purchase or offer redemption made 1) contrary to the terms of each offer, discount, promotion or coupon; 2) that otherwise is not in compliance with our Terms of Use; 3) that violates any applicable state and federal law; or 4) that we believe is fraudulent or made through improper channels.
